TermDefinition.DefinitionText: The part of the nervous system that slows the heart, dilates blood vessels, decreases pupil size, increases digestive juices, and relaxes muscles in the gastrointestinal tract.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "parasympathetic nervous system"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "sistema nervioso parasimpático"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Parte del sistema nervioso que desacelera el corazón, dilata los vasos sanguíneos, reduce el tamaño de la pupila, aumenta los jugos digestivos y relaja los músculos del aparato digestivo.
